summary: A love story wrapped in a mystery. Set in World War II Europe, a professor is changed by a cataclysmic event and explores the mysteries of life.
cast: Tim Roth|Alexandra Maria Lara|Bruno Ganz|André Hennicke|Marcel Iures|Alexandra Pirici|Adrian Pintea|Florin Piersic Jr.|Mircea Albulescu|Dan Astileanu|Cristian Balint|Dragos Bucur|Zoltan Butuc|Theodor Danetti|Andrei Gheorghe|Roxana Guttman|Lucian Iancu|Dorina Lazar|Rodica Lazar|Anamaria Marinca|Hodorog Anton Mihail|Mihai Niculescu|Gelu Nitu|Mirela Oprisor|Alexandru Repan|Rudy Rosenfeld|Dan Sandulescu|Adriana Titieni|Ana Ularu|Andi Vasluianu|Matt Damon
title: El hombre sin edad
